name: Pilso Aftermath
description:
What is this?

Pilso Aftermath is the developer's first attempt at making a platform based game in two dimensions... well true to form, Pete has actually used a 3D world and butchered a first-person controller to make a pseudo 2D game world.

Controls

Take your pick of AWD or the arrow keys to move left, right and jump. That's it. Spacebar is available as an alternative for jumping.

If you get stuck at any point, press [R] to restart the current level.

What's with the odd name?

It's an anagram. See if you can work it out!

It broke!

I've made the game with Godot 4 and I'm fighting an intermittent bug when loading new levels. Just try again if you encounter it. 90% of the time, it works every time.
